Sentece: Following a single dose, SSA was promptly absorbed (mean time to peak level 1.5 hour) and was eliminated from plasma with a mean half-life of 1.1 hour.
Title: Absorption, biotransformation, and pharmacokinetics of salicylsalicylic acid in humans.
Name: Salsalate

Sentece: Following a single dose, SSA was promptly absorbed (mean time to peak level 1.5 hour) and was eliminated from plasma with a mean half-life of 1.1 hour.
Title: Absorption, biotransformation, and pharmacokinetics of salicylsalicylic acid in humans.
Name: Salsalate

Sentece: Compared with control subjects, patients undergoing dialysis had a lower peak plasma SSA level (17 +/- 3 vs. 45 +/- 2 micrograms/ml; P less than 0.01) that occurred slightly later.
Title: Salsalate kinetics in patients with chronic renal failure undergoing hemodialysis.
Name: Salsalate

Sentece: Therefore, the AUC for SA was increased by 50% and the SA t1/2 was prolonged in the patients receiving dialysis (8.1 +/- 0.7 vs 3.8 +/- 0.2 hours; P less than 0.01).
